flow.name: site creation_siteType part
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI">
    <message id="injectListJSON" name="injectListJSON"/>
    <process id="site_creation_siteType_part" name="site creation_siteType part" isExecutable="true">
        <documentation>%3Cxml%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F1999%2Fxhtml%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22start%22%20id%3D%22219%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%20x%3D%220%22%20y%3D%220%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3Esite%20creation_siteType%20part%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%22220%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EList%20site%20types%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3ELIST_RECORDS%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%22221%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3ESelect%20site%20type%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cvalue%20name%3D%22assignee%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22currentAssignee%22%20id%3D%22222%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fvalue%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22serviceTask%22%20id%3D%22223%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EList%20site%20arguments%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22factType%22%3EREAD%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%22224%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EFill%20site%20arguments%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cvalue%20name%3D%22assignee%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22currentAssignee%22%20id%3D%22225%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fvalue%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22userTask%22%20id%3D%22232%22%20inline%3D%22false%22%3E%3Cfield%20name%3D%22NAME%22%3EView%20argumentsPacket%3C%2Ffield%3E%3Cvalue%20name%3D%22assignee%22%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22currentAssignee%22%20id%3D%22233%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fvalue%3E%3Cnext%3E%3Cblock%20type%3D%22end%22%20id%3D%22226%22%20deletable%3D%22false%22%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fnext%3E%3C%2Fblock%3E%3C%2Fxml%3E</documentation>
        <startEvent id="start" name="site creation_siteType part"/>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow21" sourceRef="start" targetRef="serviceTask40"/>
        <serviceTask id="serviceTask40" name="List site types" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_Listsitetypes_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${LIST_RECORDSMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow22" sourceRef="serviceTask40" targetRef="userTask41"/>
        <userTask id="userTask41" name="Select site type" activiti:formKey="poi_Selectsitetype_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage23" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask41">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow24" sourceRef="userTask41" targetRef="serviceTask42"/>
        <serviceTask id="serviceTask42" name="List site arguments" activiti:class="plugins.facts">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_Listsitearguments_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${READMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow25" sourceRef="serviceTask42" targetRef="userTask43"/>
        <userTask id="userTask43" name="Fill site arguments" activiti:formKey="poi_Fillsitearguments_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage26" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask43">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow27" sourceRef="userTask43" targetRef="userTask48"/>
        <userTask id="userTask48" name="View argumentsPacket" activiti:formKey="poi_ViewargumentsPacket_form" activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}"/>
        <boundaryEvent id="boundarymessage28" name="Message" cancelActivity="false" attachedToRef="userTask48">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow id="flow29" sourceRef="userTask48" targetRef="end"/>
        <endEvent id="end" name="end"/>
    </process>
</definitions>

flow.name: siteType Fact Provider Flow
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
  <process isExecutable="true" name="siteType Fact Provider Flow" id="siteType_provider">
    <startEvent name="Start" id="startevent1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="exclusivegateway1" sourceRef="startevent1" id="flow1"/>
    <endEvent name="End" id="endevent1"/>
    <exclusiveGateway default="default" name="Exclusive Gateway" id="exclusivegateway1"/>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="Unsupported" id="default"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_default_view" name="Default" id="usertask1"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_siteTypes_view" name="siteTypes" id="usertask2"/>
    <userTask activiti:formKey="poi_siteTypeParameters_view" name="siteTypeParameters" id="usertask3"/>
    <scriptTask activiti:autoStoreVariables="false" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:exclusive="false" activiti:async="true" name="List Records" id="scripttask1">
      <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//List the available siteTypes
//INPUT: ''

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.GET
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

pointflow.request( GET, JSON ) {
    uri.path = '/apidoc/sites/types'
    uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey]
    println("URI " + uri)

    response.success = {rootResp, rootJson ->
        println("success resp:" + rootJson)

        execution.setVariable('apidata_data',  new groovy.json.JsonBuilder(rootJson).toString())
    }

    response.failure = { rootResp ->
        println("failure resp:" + rootResp)
    }
    
}

//OUTPUT: 'apidata_data'

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
    </scriptTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="scripttask1" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GETRECS" id="flow2">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GETRECS"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="scripttask1" id="flow3"/>
    <scriptTask activiti:autoStoreVariables="false" scriptFormat="groovy" activiti:exclusive="false" activiti:async="true" name="Read" id="scripttask2">
      <script>//***********************************************************************************************

//List the arguments of a siteType
//INPUT: 'siteTypeId'

package processes.scripts
import groovyx.net.http.HTTPBuilder
import groovy.json.*
import static groovyx.net.http.Method.GET
import static groovyx.net.http.ContentType.JSON
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper()

//Get the OneDrive share
def pointflowInstance = execution.getVariable("wf_origServer")
def sessionKey = execution.getVariable("wf_origSessionKey")
def pointflow = new HTTPBuilder( pointflowInstance )

def siteTypeId = jsonSlurper.parseText(execution.getVariable("siteTypeId"))

//List root of OneDrive share
pointflow.request( GET, JSON ) {
    uri.path = '/apidoc/sites/types/' + siteTypeId + '/args'
    uri.query = [Authorization:sessionKey]
    println("URI " + uri)

    response.success = {rootResp, rootJson ->
        println("success resp:" + rootJson)

        execution.setVariable('apidata_data', new groovy.json.JsonBuilder(rootJson).toString())
    }

    response.failure = { rootResp ->
        println("failure resp:" + rootResp)
    }
    
}

//OUTPUT: 'apidata_data'

//***********************************************************************************************</script>
    </scriptTask>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="scripttask2" sourceRef="exclusivegateway1" name="GET" id="flow4">
      <conditionExpression xsi:type="tFormalExpression">${apidata_method == "GET"}</conditionExpression>
    </sequenceFlow>
    <sequenceFlow targetRef="endevent1" sourceRef="scripttask2" id="flow5"/>
  </process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagram_siteType_provider">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlane_siteType_provider" bpmnElement="siteType_provider">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_startevent1" bpmnElement="startevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="70.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_endevent1" bpmnElement="endevent1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="740.0" width="35.0" height="35.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_exclusivegateway1" bpmnElement="exclusivegateway1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="161.0" x="150.0" width="40.0" height="40.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask1" bpmnElement="usertask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="460.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask2" bpmnElement="usertask2">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="530.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_usertask3" bpmnElement="usertask3">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="600.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_scripttask1" bpmnElement="scripttask1">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="220.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="BPMNShape_scripttask2" bpmnElement="scripttask2">
        <omgdc:Bounds y="310.0" x="334.0" width="105.0" height="55.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow1" bpmnElement="flow1">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="105.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="150.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_default" bpmnElement="default">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="190.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="181.0" x="740.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="164.0" x="209.0" width="63.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow2" bpmnElement="flow2">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="201.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="247.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="247.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="219.0" x="180.0" width="100.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow3" bpmnElement="flow3">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="247.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="245.0" x="756.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="199.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow4" bpmnElement="flow4">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="201.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="337.0" x="170.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="337.0" x="334.0"/>
        <bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
          <omgdc:Bounds y="309.0" x="190.0" width="100.0" height="13.0"/>
        </bpmndi:BPMNLabel>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="BPMNEdge_flow5" bpmnElement="flow5">
        <omgdi:waypoint y="337.0" x="439.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="336.0" x="756.0"/>
        <omgdi:waypoint y="199.0" x="757.0"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</definitions>
